description: Extension of Beatty sequence; complement of A045681.
links: A. S. Fraenkel, Heap games, numeration systems and sequences, Annals of Combinatorics, 2 (1998), 197-210.
Index entries for sequences related to Beatty sequences
mathematica: s=2; t=3;mex:=First[Complement[Range[1,Max[#1]+1],#1]]&;a[0]=0; b[n_]:=b[n]=s*a[n]+t*n;a[n_]:=a[n]=mex[Flatten[Table[{a[i],b[i]},{i,0,n-1}]]];Table[a[n],{n,200}] (* A045681 *)Table[b[n],{n,200}] (* A045682 *)(* From _Clark Kimberling_, Apr 02 2011 *)
author: _Aviezri S. Fraenkel_
